title: KKND 2: Krush Kill 'N Destroy Krossfire for PC
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM and CD jewel case with insert
brief_description: The battle for Earth rages on in the bleak world of KKnD2: Krossfire. The Survivors and Mutes from the previous game are joined by a new enemy: the Series 9. The Series 9 are a robot faction with origins in farm machinery. The radiation from mankind’s wars has warped their programming and they’ve taken up arms against the two original factions, who have destroyed the crops that they were designed to care for. As with the prior games, this game’s focus is resource management, base building, researching upgrades and the creation of units to defeat the other factions.
